column3: Sept 29 A Boeing 787 Dreamliner  operated by Poland's LOT airline had to land unexpectedly in Iceland on Sunday due to a fault in its air identification system
column4: a spokeswoman for the airline said on Sunday.Analysis: New trial for Boeing as Norwegian demands 787 repairs PARIS/NEW YORK The brochure for Boeing Co's aircraft repair service makes a simple assertion: "No one knows Boeing airplanes better than Boeing."
